title: Resetting Your Device
content: To reset your device, press and hold the power button for 10 seconds until the screen goes blank and the logo reappears.

title: Warranty Information
content: Our products come with a 1-year warranty covering manufacturer defects. Accidental damage is not covered.

title: Battery Life
content: The device battery lasts up to 12 hours on a single charge, depending on usage.

title: Refund Policy
content: Customers can request a refund within 30 days of purchase, provided the product is in its original condition.

title: Connecting to Wi-Fi
content: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, select your network, and enter the password to connect.

title: Device Not Charging
content: If the device does not charge, try using a different charging cable and adapter. Make sure the charging port is clean and free from debris.

title: Software Update
content: To update your device, go to Settings > About > Software Update and follow the on-screen instructions.

title: Returning a Product
content: To return a product, visit our website and fill out the return form. Ensure the item is securely packaged and include the original receipt.

title: Product Registration
content: Register your product on our website by entering the serial number and filling out the registration form.

title: Order Status
content: To check your order status, visit our website and enter your order number under the 'Track My Order' section.
